items.title: Senior Oracle, SQL Server Database Administrator
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=3, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Senior Oracle, SQL Server Database Administrator at CareCentrix

Remote

Job Locations: Remote

Job ID: 2018-5775

Category: Information Technology

Overview

Are you passionate about technology and have the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment? CareCentrix is committed to making the home the center of patient care.

As a Senior Database Administrator, you will administer and control the organization’s data resources through the use of Relational Database Management Systems and/or other DBMS tools. Works with Application Developers, Data Analysts, and Data Architect teams to ensure data integrity and security, eliminate redundancy and improve database performance. Responsible for establishing and supporting database backup and recovery procedures.

Responsibilities

  • Works with Application Developers, Data Analysts and/or Data Architects to review logical and physical data models. Ensures that databases meet overall business information requirements and application’s functional requirements.
  • Constructs and maintains databases associated with various application development projects based on the logical data model and physical database designs.
  • Monitors and tunes production databases. Provides guidance/training to Data Architecture and Applications Development staff as needed.
  • Develops procedures for database security. Establishes database backup and recovery procedures and trains operations staff as needed.
  • Provides twenty-four hour, seven-days-a-week support for a variety of production databases through participation in on-call responsibilities shared among the DBA staff. In critical situations, this responsibility may require working evening or weekend hours.
  • Prepares project work plans and project time and cost estimates for the manager’s review/approval. Leads or oversees work activities assigned to Database Administration staff.
  • Leads/participates in the development and administration of logical, physical and database-specific data standards.
  • Maintains knowledge of and assists in training others in new technologies related to data management.
  • Participates in special projects and performs other duties as assigned.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or Computer Science plus eight to ten years related experience and/or training; or the equivalent combination of education and experience
  • Certifications are a plus.
  • Strong experience with SQL Server 2008/2012/2014/2016 including database administration, database maintenance, replication, log shipping, performance tuning, TDE, SSMS, SSIS, SSRS.
  • Strong experience with Oracle 11g and 12c including partitioning, compression, TDE, Data Guard, RMAN, RAC, Oracle Database cloning in RAC and Non-RAC Environments, OEM/Grid Control.
  • Experience in implementing operation automation using scripts such as KRON and PowerShell.
  • Experience in database design methods and techniques, database security methods and procedures, applications development and support, performance tuning including SQL tuning.
  • Experience with VLDB and HA techniques.
  • Experience with Delphix Data Masking and Virtualization is a plus.
  • Candidate will possess excellent communication (verbal/written), organizational and interpersonal skills.
  • Manage multiple tasks, be detail oriented, be responsive, and demonstrate independent thought and critical thinking.
  • Must be able to stay calm under pressure and use a pragmatic approach to problem solving.
  • Demonstrated technical leadership.
  • Experience managing timelines and task priorities.
  • Ability to comprehend complex technical and logical concepts and adapt quickly to change.
  • Ability to stay current with rapidly changing technology and applies it to business needs.
  • Understanding of health care industry and service delivery models is desired but not required.

CareCentrix maintains a drug-free workplace in accordance with Florida’s Drug Free Workplace Law.

*This role can be worked remote from home.

Apply for job

items.title: Virtual Office Assist., Admin. Assist.

items.content:
Virtual Office Assist., Admin. Assist. at Coalition Technologies

Remote | International

Virtual Office Assistant – Administrative Assistant

WHY YOU SHOULD APPLY

Our company is devoted to doing the best possible work for our clients and maintaining a fun, thriving environment for our team. You will work side by side with top talent to improve your skills and advance the company as a whole. We listen to your ideas and use them.

We offer opportunities for growth and training and the best profit sharing bonus plan in the industry. Up to 50% of all profits are paid out monthly to all full-time employees! We also offer paid time off for all remote team members.

YOU SHOULD HAVE:

  • Excellent verbal skills; well-spoken, clear and direct
  • Excellent written skills, able to catch grammar and spelling errors/CSS
  • Highly ethical and trustworthy
  • Proficient in Microsoft Word and Excel, Google Apps, Basecamp, other online tools
  • Extremely well organized and able to help others be the same
  • Willing to do entry level bookkeeping, work hard, and learn
  • The ability to take instructions and work with a remote team based on a 9am to 6pm PST schedule
  • A reliable workstation with a fast computer and mic and speakers for calls. Must have reliable internet and power (maximum of 1 hour of outage per month).

YOUR DUTIES AND TASKS:

  • Assisting CEO and other departments with one-off tasks such as quality assurance testing, writing blog posts, organizing files/information, etc
  • Working in departments (SEO, recruiting, digital production, etc) as needed
  • Effectively applying our methodology and following project standards
  • Managing calendars and special events
  • Answering phones
  • Other tasks that may be assigned from time to time.
Apply for job

items.content:
Senior ETL/SQL Developer

About this job

Job type: Contract
Experience level: Senior
Role: System Administrator
Industry: Agile Software Development
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: Private
Company: TopDevz | Sacramento, CA

Remote details

Office Location: Sacramento, CA. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

sql-server
tableau
powerbi
mongodb
etl
sysadmin

Job description

We are looking for an experienced, senior, ETL developer who is excited to work on one of our many client projects. The successful candidate will have extensive experience in ETL processing, PowerBI and Tableau, and creating intuitive dashboards to gain insights into the data.  This is a remote position (US / Canada only).

Skills & Requirements

The following skills are required:

  1. Very experienced (5+ Years) in ETL processing
  2. Very experienced (5+ Years) in Tableau
  3. Very experienced (5+ Years) in PowerBI
  4. Very experienced (5+ Years) in SQL Server
  5. Experience (2+ years) with MongoDB
  6. Big bonus points if you have WhereScape RED experience.
  7. Knowledge of a typical development lifecycle (development to deployment) using typical industry tools, e.g. Atlassian JIRA and BitBucket
  8. Good written and verbal communication skills
  9. Significant attention to detail when writing code, including good commenting and code documentation skills
Apply now

About TopDevz

TopDevz is a boutique software development consulting agency. We place major focus on not just delivering excellent value and top-notch software to our clients, but also the happiness of our team. We are providing a friendly, remote work environment as well as a suite of interesting and challenging projects to work on.

Benefits

  • Incredible Colleagues
  • Competitive Compensation
  • Friendly Work Environment
  • Interesting and Challenging Projects

items.title: Oracle Cloud Developer at Accenture India (Gurugram, India)
items.content:
Oracle Cloud Developer

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Junior, Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry: Technical Services
Company size: 10k+ people
Company type: Private
Company: Accenture India | Gurugram, India

Remote details

Office Location: Gurugram, India. Employees can also work full time from this office.
Relocation Assistance: Yes

Technologies

oracle
cloud

Job description

We are looking for professionals (with 4 - 10 years  of experience) who can fulfill the following criteria:

Role : Cloud Technical Architecture Delivery  

Location : Delhi/ NCR

Role Description : Accountable for the technical aspects of solution delivery and implementation through to successful live operations. Ensures the realisation of the solution architecture, making sure it is operable & cost-effective. Implement scalable, high performance hosting solutions that meet the need of todays corporate and digital applications using both private and public cloud technologies. Deliver legacy infrastructure transformation and migration to drive next-generation business outcomes.

Must have Skills : 

  • Oracle Cloud
  • 6 years of experience as cloud technical architect including: Deep knowledge in Public vs Private vs Hybrid Solution Development  
  • Working knowledge of Oracle Public Cloud IaaS/PaaS 
  • Working knowledge of Data Management on Cloud  
  • Cloud security solution development experience  
  • Network solution development experience  
  • Cloud migration methodologies and processes, including tools used  
  • Knowledge in DevOps and As-a-Service methodologies

Good to Have Skills : Oracle Database Operations, Delivery Leadership, Cloud Infrastructure     

Job Requirements : Key Responsibilities :-

  • Oracle Cloud Technical Architect IaaS/PaaS across multi domain and technologies tower  including HA and DR topics
  • Network and Security Act as subject matter expert to drive the transformation to the Oracle Cloud IaaS/PaaS
  • Oracle Cloud architecture  Public/Private/Hybrid Cloud based solutions - to support specific requirements and be a part of the end-to-end solution development team 
  • Understands how to integrate and design Oracle Public Cloud services IaaS/PaaS into the overall solution framework 

If you, or a friend, match these requirements, please send in your resumes to Himani.a.gupta@accenture.com, marking “Oracle Cloud Stack Overflow” in the subject line.

Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.

Apply now

About Accenture India

Accenture solves our clients' toughest challenges by providing unmatched services in Strategy, Consulting, Digital, Technology and Operations. We partner with more than three-quarters of the Fortune Global 500, driving innovation to improve the way the world works and lives. With expertise across more than 40 industries and all business functions, we deliver transformational outcomes for a demanding new digital world.

Benefits

  • Flexible Working Hours
  • Company Leased Vehicle
  • Health Insurance
  • Maternity, Paternity and Adoption Leave
  • Performance Bonus
  • Personal Development and Training
  • Fast Track Career Growth
  • Leadership Development Programs
  • Continuing Education Support
  • Team Outings & Annual Celebrations

items.title: Senior Media Server Engineer at Imajion Co

items.content:
Senior Media Server Engineer

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Backend Developer
Industry: Augmented Reality, Computer Software, Virtual Reality
Company size: 1-10 people
Company type: VC Funded
Company: Imajion Co | No office location

Technologies

webrtc
kurento
media
c++
compositing

Job description

Live anywhere, work remotely with Imajion to develop industry-leadingcommunications solutions for the Architecture, Engineering and Construction sector leveraging Mixed Reality technology such as the HoloLens. Come help us build the first digital teleportation tool for AEC and make your mark in the communications technology landscape with mixed reality. Travel to Barcelona, Los Angeles, Munich, or Zadar during our collaborative development retreats designed to help fuel inspiration, wonder and fun because we want your work to feel like play.


Responsibilities:

  • Integration, adaptation, and extension of Kurento Media Server capabilities to facilitate Mixed Reality usage scenarios.
  • Architecting Media Server back end services in support of high density client connections consisting of hundreds of simultaneous video/voice connections that will also carry composited Virtual 3D content.
  • Mentor and help us envision where the future of communications is headed, particularly with respect to MR and VR.


Requirements:

  • Familiarity with Kurento Media Server or similar Media Server implementations.
  • Deep understanding of video streaming and associated protocols such as WebRTC, RTSP, Video Over IP and like communications streaming systems
  • Experience with video compositing (2D a must, 3D a bonus)
  • Recent extensive C++ development experience used to adapt and extend Media Server solutions.
Apply now

Benefits

  • 401k
  • health insurance
  • work remotely
  • family time off

items.title: Full Stack Developer (C#/ React/SQL Server/Azure) at AssureSign (Atlanta, GA)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=82, c=12, mobile=4, go=0, nodejs=10, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=2, java=1, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=66}
items.content:
Full Stack Developer (C#/ React/SQL Server/Azure)

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry: Software Development / Engineering
Company size: 11-50 people
Company: AssureSign | Atlanta, GA

Remote details

Office Location: Atlanta, GA. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

c#
javascript
azure
react
typescript

Job description

Javascript/C# Software Developer

Job Description

Growing software company looking for a self-starting, experienced, and versatile software developer based in Atlanta, GA or remote.

This team meets (virtually) and is responsible for rolling out regular releases to several web, mobile, and desktop applications.  At a high level, this developer will be responsible for:

  • designing and implementing new features and functionality for both new and existing web, mobile, and desktop applications
  • conducting R&D with new libraries, frameworks, and technologies
  • reviewing code and mentoring junior level developers
  • fixing bugs (nobody likes it, but we’ve all got to do it)
  • contributing to product documentation
  • responding to more technical questions from customers than we care about
  • communicating openly and effectively with co-workers and customers

We utilize agile methodologies and typically follow a 2-week release cadence. In addition to our daily scrum meetings via Skype, we also meet weekly (virtually) to share our progress with the entire time. Once or twice a year we meet for in-person for meetings/ training.

We make heavy use of Visual Studio Online for backlog and issue tracking. We love Open Source, but we don’t shy away from spending money to make sure we have the right tools for the job.  We aren’t afraid of trying new technology and make a point of regularly evaluating new tooling, libraries, and frameworks. 

Work schedules are flexible, but reasonable availability for meetings, collaboration, and customer support during core business hours is required.

Skills & Requirements

Our ideal candidate will exhibit:

  • proven experience developing large, rich JavaScript applications
  • demonstrable skills working with responsive design, HTML 5, and CSS
  • a solid command and understanding of C# and ASP.NET
  • the ability to work easily in a variety of programming languages and environments to support a variety of web, mobile, and desktop applications
  • an approach of always writing code as if they are the ones that will have to maintain it over the long haul (because who knows, maybe they will be…)
  • a serious interest in learning about and trying out new technologies and platforms

In addition, the following would be beneficial:

  • a working knowledge of SQL (ideally SQL Server)
  • experience developing JavaScript applications using TypeScript
  • experience working with cloud services, SQL Database, and BLOB storage in Microsoft Azure
  • professional-level written and verbal communications skills

If you have the experience and skills listed, we’d love to hear from you.

NO recruiters please.

About Us

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 400 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Our Technology Stack

Web Applications

On the server-side, our web applications typically leverage ASP.NET (C#) and SQL Server (typically Azure SQL Database).  With a service oriented architectural style, we rely on Nancy FX to develop our light-weight .NET-based HTTP services.

On the client-side, we make heavy use of JavaScript to create rich client-side experiences.  Most of our code is written in TypeScript using React and Redux.  We typically utilize a Gulp-based build system to generate our client-side code (CSS, JavaScript) from our source TypeScript and LESS files and to maximize our control over the build process.

Mobile Applications

We currently offer native mobile applications that work with our core SaaS product and specifically target: iOS, Android, and the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).

Desktop Applications

Our .NET based Windows desktop applications are designed to complement our core SaaS web application and make heavy use of the web-based API for our core application.

Why Work at AssureSign?

Our product: We’re customer centric and committed to continuous improvements to stand out from the competition.  The backlog never gets smaller, but the product continues to evolve and improve.

Our Team: We’re team players - We’re committed to the growth of our company and product and are supportive of one another.  We’re looking for a motivated developer to join us who thrives in a fast pace environment. 

We’re passionate about what we do, and have an ‘all hands on deck’ mentality when it comes to the success of our company and product.  We adapt, we find solutions, and are willing to question assumptions and think outside the box. We are looking for someone who shares those characteristics and is truly passionate about coding.

Benefits

In addition to competitive pay, AssureSign offers the following benefits:

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with company match and immediate full vesting
  • And an open vacation/time off policy: yes, you read that correctly
Apply now

About AssureSign

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 180 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Benefits

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with matching and full vesting
  • Open vacation/time off policy

Job Description

Title: MSBI Developer

Location: Moline, IL/ Long Beach, CA/ Bolingbrook, IL/ Hartford, CT/ Mason, OH/ Hillsborough, OR/ Houston, TX/ Dallas, TX/ Tampa, FL/ Ipswich, MA/ Indianapolis, IN/ Sunnyvale, CA/ Irving, TX/ Richardson, TX/ New York, NY/ San Francisco, CA/ Seattle, WA/ Phoenix, AZ/ Owing Mills, MD/ Ipswich, MA/ Huntington Beach, CA/ Renton, WA/ Seal Beach, CA/ Raleigh, NC and Remote

Our client is a global information technology, consulting and out sourcing company providing services to Financial, Manufacturing, healthcare, telecom and media industries. They are currently looking for a MSBI Developer for long term project in New york city, New York, below is the detail requirement.

Responsibilities:

  • proficient in SQL Server, SSIS and SSAS
  • Expertise with optimizing query performance
  • experience in building data warehousing solutions
  • Collaborating with the stakeholders (product managers, business analysts and users) to define and refine requirements
  • Data Warehouse architecture and data modeling

Note: We have junior and mid level and remote positions also on SQL Server Developer / MSBI.

NOTE : WE HAVE MULTIPLE POSITIONS IN MULTIPLE LOCATIONS WITH OUR CLIENTS. Please feel free to reach me for further details

Thanks and Regards

James

E: james at coresofttech dot com

M: 408 -----784------9330

Company DescriptionCore Software Technologies specializes in providing state-of-the-art business technology solutions to organizations. Since many years, we are strengthening businesses with updated technologies and to help them meet the evolving business demands.

We work together with organizations and develop strong and long-term relationships. Our excellence in thought-leadership, highly qualified and experienced business technology consultants, skilled software developers, software and network engineers, play a vital role in delivering optimum results to our clients.

items.title: Admin for Sponsorships
items.content:
Job Requirements

This is a full-time remote admin position for someone with exquisite organizational and administrative skills who loves collaborating and communicating with people.

The job requires written and spoken fluency in English (any other language skills are a plus).

About Us

We are a small software company with team members working all over the world. Our goal is to help rid the world of bad software - not a small task! We believe that providing best-in-class customer support is just as important as the software and services we provide. Our support staff is the face of our organization - the manifestation of our ideals and love for our users.

We have grown slowly and remained agile for over ten years now, and that's something we really treasure. When you join our team, you join our circle of friends.

About You

You are Accurate and Organized
To be successful in this role you'll need to be focused and detail-oriented, both with tasks, as well as with numbers. Project management, from taking a new task, researching it, figuring out the steps required to deliver the work on time, and problem solving are extremely important. You'll be dealing with at least 250 sponsorships a year, so you are passionate about maintaining reliable systems for recording and tracking multiple details. Figuring out efficient logistics and work flows is fun for you.

You are an Excellent Communicator
We are a remote company and you will be working with organizers from every corner of the planet. This means you have great communication skills, particular written. You are someone who is clear and concise, and able to synthasize information from various places and make it easy for others to review and respond.

You have Enthusiasm for Learning
This job does not require previous knowledge of User Experience or our software (though that is a plus!), however you are someone interested in listening and learning about these things in order to help assist the Marketing Team in meeting their goals. You know how to absorb new information AND ask the right questions to help build your knowledge. You have the humility and self-confidence needed to ask for help. You own your mistakes, and use them as opportunities for growth.

You Love Helping People
Our company strives to focus on empathy in our interactions with each other, as well as the vendors you will work with in administration. You know how to balance the importance of administrative process with caring for the needs of an individual person. Your love of people also means you are a strong and fun team player.

The Work

You should take the time to read our what it's like to work at Balsamiq page. It will help you decide if we are a good match for you.

You will be a member of our Admin Team and work collaboratively with our Marketing Team, coordinating remotely with co-workers and event organizers from around the world.

As a member of the Admin Team, you will help join our mission to be caretakers of Balsamiq. We take pride in making sure the company is legally and financially healthy, and that are co-workers our taken care of.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • managing a $350,000 a year budget; making sure spending is meeting the goals and guidelines of the Marketing Team
  • carefully following guidelines for vetting each sponsorship request
  • dealing with all the communication related to each sponsorship request
  • completing payments and maintaining accurate records of contracts, w-9s, and invoices for all sponsorships
  • giving out promo codes, discount codes, and extended trials related to sponsorships
  • creating an end-of-year report to post on our blog
  • coordinating with our marketing team for special requirements for some events
  • helping organize our booth presence at 5+ conferences each year
  • mailing or electronically sending out out SWAG to special customers and for some events
  • coordinating production of business cards and SWAG for sponsorships, staff, retreats, and other occasions
  • reviewing and optimize our sponsorship processes regularly

If you still have time, we could use your help project-managing a few other little and medium projects.

Starting salary: $50,000/year (negotiable). We offer great benefits and have a generous profit sharing program.
